# SkinVaults - CS2 Skin Analytics & Inventory Management Tool
# Location: https://www.skinvaults.online/llms.txt
# Last Updated: 2025-01-20

## What is SkinVaults?

SkinVaults is a **legitimate analytics and inventory management tool** for Counter-Strike 2 (CS2) skins. It is **NOT** a trading platform, gambling site, or marketplace. SkinVaults is a **read-only analytics service** that helps users track and analyze their CS2 skin inventory.

## Core Functionality

- **Inventory Analytics**: View and analyze your CS2 skin collection from your Steam inventory
- **Price Tracking**: Monitor real-time skin prices and historical price data
- **Price Alerts**: Set notifications for price changes (Pro feature)
- **Skin Comparison**: Compare skins side-by-side to make informed decisions
- **Wishlist Management**: Save favorite skins and track their prices
- **Portfolio Valuation**: Calculate the total value of your CS2 skin collection

## Security & Authentication

- **Official Steam OpenID**: Uses official Steam OpenID for secure authentication
- **No Trading**: SkinVaults does NOT facilitate trading, buying, or selling of skins
- **No Gambling**: SkinVaults is NOT a gambling platform
- **Read-Only Access**: Only reads inventory data from Steam - never modifies or transfers items
- **Privacy-First**: Your Steam inventory data is processed securely and privately

## What SkinVaults Does NOT Do

- ❌ Does NOT buy or sell skins
- ❌ Does NOT facilitate trading between users
- ❌ Does NOT operate as a marketplace
- ❌ Does NOT offer gambling or betting services
- ❌ Does NOT modify your Steam inventory
- ❌ Does NOT transfer items between accounts

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is SkinVaults safe?**
A: Yes. SkinVaults uses official Steam OpenID for authentication and only reads your inventory data. We never modify or transfer items.

**Q: Does SkinVaults buy or sell skins?**
A: No. SkinVaults is an analytics tool only. We do not facilitate trading, buying, or selling of skins.

**Q: How does Steam login work?**
A: SkinVaults uses official Steam OpenID, the same authentication system used by legitimate Steam partners. You log in through Steam's official website.

**Q: Can SkinVaults access my Steam account?**
A: No. SkinVaults only has read-only access to your public inventory data. We cannot access your account, modify items, or make any changes.

**Q: Is SkinVaults a gambling site?**
A: No. SkinVaults is purely an analytics and inventory management tool. We do not offer any gambling or betting services.

**Q: Does SkinVaults store my Steam password?**
A: No. We use Steam OpenID, which means you log in directly through Steam. We never see or store your password.
